data.title: Eleanor Helen Stanley 1536 - 1578
data.meta_description: Eleanor was born about 1536 in Cross Hall, Aughton, Lancashire, England. Eleanors father was Sir James Stanley (of Crosshall ) and her mother was Anne Hart. Her p...
data.text:
Susan Szkilnyk

2 favorites

08/15/2014

.

Sir James Stanley (Knight) .

Born Abt 1491 of, Knockin, Shropshire, England .

Gender Male .

AFN 8JSC-42 .

of Cross hall, Lancashire, England .

Person ID I20339.

Europe: Royal and Noble Houses of Europe .

.

Father George Stanley, 9th Lord Strange, b. Abt 1460, of Knowsley, Lancashire, England , d. 5 Dec 1497.

Mother Joan le Strange, Lady Strange of Knockin, Lady Mohun of Dunster, b. Cal 1459, of, Knockin, Shropshire, England , d. 20 Mar 1513-1514, Colham Green, Middlesex, England .

Married Bef 26 Feb 1481 .

Family ID F9646 Group Sheet.

.

Spouse Anne Hart, b. Abt 1491, Lullingstone, Kent, England , d. Yes, date unknown .

Married 1510 .

Children .

1. Sir George Stanley, Knight, b. Abt 1522, Cross Hall, Aughton, Lancashire, England , d. Yes, date unknown.

2. Edward Stanley, b. Abt 1526, Cross Hall, Aughton, Lancashire, England , d. Yes, date unknown .

3. Thomas Stanley, b. Abt 1528, Cross Hall, Aughton, Lancashire, England , d. Yes, date unknown.

4. Jane Stanley, b. Abt 1530, Cross Hall, Aughton, Lancashire, England , d. Yes, date unknown.

5. Margaret Stanley, b. Abt 1532, Cross Hall, Aughton, Lancashire, England , d. Yes, date unknown.

6. Henry Stanley, Esquire, b. Abt 1534, Cross Hall, Aughton, Lancashire, England , d. 23 Jul 1598, Bickerstaffe, Lancashire, England .

7. Eleonor Stanley, Aughton Rickerstaffe, Lancashire, England , bur. 25 Jan 1578-1579 .

8. Anne Stanley, d. Yes, date unknown .

9. Mary Stanley, d. Yes, date unknown.

Sources .
